data.title: 15 Best Jobs for Trade School Graduates
data.meta_description: Do you want a technical job and a career that you can begin quickly? BestColleges spotlights the 15 best jobs for trade school graduates.
data.text:
The 15 Best Trade School Jobs and Their Salaries

Let's dive into 15 of the highest-paying trade school jobs. The numbers included below can give you a clear idea of the different earning potentials of these vocations. Note that your actual salary will vary depending on several factors, like location, employer, and your own qualifications.

Job security, or how likely an employee is to keep their job over many years and maintain a consistent income, is also addressed. Each career profile includes information on its future growth based on projections from the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS).

TRADE JOB MEDIAN SALARY

(2023) PROJECTED JOB GROWTH RATE (2022-2032) Elevator Installer and Repairer $102,420 1% Radiation Therapist $98,300 2% Web Developer $92,750 16% Dental Hygienist $87,530 7% Diagnostic Medical Sonographer $80,850 10% Electrical Line Worker $85,420 3% Respiratory Therapist $77,960 13% Electrician $61,590 6% Plumber $61,550 2% Mortician $60,580 3% IT Technician $60,810 5% Wind Turbine Technician $61,770 45% Legal Assistant $60,970 4% HVACR Technician $57,300 6% Licensed Practical Nurse $59,730 5%

Source: Bureau of Labor Statistics
